content: k2 to end of round 2 sts increase d round 5 purl to gm sgm k2 p2 sm 2/1 rpc 2/1 lpc 2/1 rpc sm p2 k2 to end of round round 6 ptfb purl to 1 st before mkr ptfb sgm k2 p2 sm k2 p2 k4 p1 sm p2 k2 to end of round 2 sts increase d round 7 purl to gm sgm k2 p2 sm k2 p2 2/2 lc p1 sm p2 k2 to end of round round 8 ptfb purl to 1 st before mkr ptfb sgm k2 p2 sm k2 p2 k4 p1 sm p2 k2 to end of round 2 sts increase d mitt should now have 10 sts between bor marker and gm separate thumb left mitt round 1 purl to gm sgm k2 p2 sm 2/1 lpc 2/1 rpc 2/1 lpc sm p2 k2 to end of round round 2 place 10 sts for thumb on waste yarn rgm with backward loop co 2 sts k2 p2 sm p1 k4 p2 k2 sm p2 k2 to end of round rnds 3-8 repeat from lower cuff upper cuff right/left mitt p2 k2 p2 sm k1 p1 4 times k1 sm p2 k2 to end of round work 4 rnds remove all stitch markers bobble all stitches in pattern thumb right/left mitt place 10 sts from waste yarn on needles and rejoin yarn pick up and knit 2 sts where thumb meets hand pm 12 sts next round purl to end of round continue to purl all sts for 5 rounds or until desired length remove all stitch markers bobble all stitches in pattern finishing weave ends in and block to measurements chart & legend __________________________________________________________________________________________________ chart is read from right to left cable pattern lana © fiber co 2019 all rights reserved
